title: 398. Q&AF: Promoting Healthy Competition Amongst Employees, Supporting Child’s Entrepreneurial Ambition & Evaluating Your Circle Of Friends
itunes:title: 398. Q&AF: Promoting Healthy Competition Amongst Employees, Supporting Child’s Entrepreneurial Ambition & Evaluating Your Circle Of Friends
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to promote healthy competition between employees without creating a toxic environment, how to support your children in their entrepreneurial pursuits, and when you should evaluate your circle of friends to set yourself up for success.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to promote healthy competition between employees without creating a toxic environment, how to support your children in their entrepreneurial pursuits, and when you should evaluate your circle of friends to set yourself up for success.
